headline: Baker Hughes : Launches Advanced Flame Detection Technology for Gas Turbines
summary: May 15, 2025 - Baker Hughes, an energy technology company, announced Thursday the launch of an advanced flame detection technology, Flame Tracker Increased Low Gain , designed to enhance flame sensing...
